page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA.
page.content: WITH THREE EXCEPTIONS ALL EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA IS PROVIDED BY KNOYDART PENINSULA ESTATE THE EMPLOYMENT IS ALL OUT DOOR STALKERS THE STALKERS IN SEASON SHOOT FOXES AND CUBS(25 PER YEAR) TO PROTECT LAMBS IN AUGUST STAG SHOOTING BEGINS(140 PER YEAR).IN DECEMBER AND JANUARY HINDS ARE CULLED(200 PER YEAR) FISHING THE STALKERS GHILLIE IN SEASON FOR FISHING LETS.THE ANNUAL CATCH IS A 100 BROWN TROUT,50 SALMON AND 100 SEA TROUT FORESTRY THERE IS A WOOD-MILL WHERE THE TREES FELLED IN THE AREA ARE CUT.5 TON OF HARD WOOD AND 200 TON OF SOFT WOOD ARE EXTRACTED PER YEAR.THIS WOOD IS USED FOR STOBS,SARKING AND FIRE WOOD BOATS THE AREA HAS FOUR BOATS OPERATED AND MAINTAINED BY THE BOATMEN
